comments.body:
@rodrigok is possible to us to send the username/name based on `UI_Use_Realname` setting to be joined with the message after decrypted on client side?
When it came from a group we should show `(username/name): message`, it's a little pain to read the setting of `Realname` on notification context for us, so if it's possible to be sent by the server, it would be very good.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +64,68 @@			messageType: message.t,
			tmid: message.tmid,
			...message.t === 'e2e' && { msg: message.msg },
		},
		roomName: settings.get('Push_show_username_room') && roomTypes.getConfig(room.t).isGroupChat(room) ? `#${ roomTypes.getRoomName(room.t, room) }` : '',
